270.title: UI: As an organizer I can create events and set their location, tags and capacity.

271.title: UI: As an organizer I can add a chapter or organization logo.

272.title: UI: As an organizer I can edit details about the chapter, including a Slack/Discord/Facebook/WeChat/WhatsApp link participants can join to discuss and coordinate events.

273.title: UI: As an organizer, I can create a chapter

274.title: UI: As a chapter member, I can unsubscribe from emails.

275.title: Text for: As a future participant after the event, I will automatically get emails notifying me of subsequent events.

276.title: Text for: As a future participant I will receive a second email the day before the event to remind me.

277.title: UI: As a future participant I can cancel the "RSVP".

278.title: UI: As a future participant I can click the "RSVP" button. When I do, I will be prompted to sign in. Then I will receive an email with a ticket and add me to the public list of event attendees.

279.title: UI: As a future participant when I click one of those locations, I can see the "show view" for that event's chapter, with details about the upcoming event, along with a button to RSVP.

280.title: UI: As a future participant I can use a search box on the landing page to input a city, state, or country name and it will autocomplete. I can click one of those locations.

281.title: UI: As an admin I can add a Google Analytics ID.

282.title: Updated documentation & fix small error with environment variables

284.title: Docs: Update README: Tech Stack; Links for Vision, MVP, Roadmap; Clarify terminology
